divs: Sighting Details Heading west on Center St. in Lewiston, NY,I looked up through the windshield and saw 6-8 white starlike lights but round and bigger than a star. MY friend M., who was with me , saw them also. We stopped and got out of the car to look; they were completely stationary. We got back into the car, drove about three blocks with the objects in view.Then they instantaneously vanished,no trace ,no contrail.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lewiston
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: two witnesses to distant stationary lights
